about_the_game:
Sears: The Sky Frontier is a beautiful and epic real-time strategy game in which you have to lead an army of cute stone men and resist fearsome invaders, carefully thinking through the course of the battle and leading the defense in unique and atmospheric locations.


The invaders attacked the peaceful sky city and want to occupy all its parts. Break their plans and protect your lands wisely using the available resources. Build fortifications, arrange squads of warriors with their unique abilities and upgrade them.


Before the start of the collision, scatter traps, explosive barrels and electrical installations throughout the level, distribute the available troops and think over the course of the battle, adjust to the changing environment and do everything to withstand the defense!

World



All locations in Sears are divided into specific areas with their own visual style and unique atmosphere. You will have to defend or storm enemy positions in various conditions, using all the tactical advantages of specific islands.


By pushing the enemy back, you will eventually get the opportunity to organize and conduct assaults on enemy positions on their islands, and if you're lucky, get weapons from the invaders, as well as call for fire support! Surviving the attack on the most important islands, you will get access to new warriors, buildings and upgrades that will help you in further battles!

Key features:

  • Lead an army of stone warriors, transfer units and distribute available resources for successful defense against enemy attacks!
  • Use the tactical advantages of a variety of locations with their own unique atmosphere.
  • Different types of warriors with their own abilities.
  • Build defensive walls, place heavy weapons and traps, think over the course of the battle!
  • Gather troops to storm the enemy and improve your warriors, do everything to protect your kingdom!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10 only 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD FX 8300 or Equivalent, Intel Core i5 3470 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 460 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10 only 64 bit
  • Processor: Processor Intel® Core™ i5 2400 3.4 GHz or i5 7400 3.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen R5 1600X 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 8GB or RTX3060 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
